data.title: Brittany Murphy by True Crime & Cocktails
data.meta_description:
Welcome to season 2, the Famous Fatalities Edition! Lauren and Christy start the new season off right as they reminisce about a heated moment at a Denny’s. Then the duo deep dives into the life and tragic death of actress Brittany Murphy! Christy uncovers a shady husband and an over-prescribing doctor, while Lauren reveals some research of her own! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party! __
SHOW INFORMATION 
Instagram: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails 
Facebook: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails 
Website: truecrimeandcocktails.com
Email: theories@truecrimeandcocktails.com
Twitter: @NotDetectives
data.text:
Want a sneak peek into the world of True Crime & Cocktails on Patreon?! Well here's your chance! In a special "Happy Hour" episode, Lauren & Christy discuss the Austin Yogurt Shop murders with the one and only Rachael Ray!! And then in a "Last Call" episode, Lauren & Christy go off on a tangent while Blanche surprises Lauren with one of her biggest '80s crushes! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!

__

SHOW INFORMATION

Instagram: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Facebook: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Website: truecrimeandcocktails.com

Email: theories@truecrimeandcocktails.com

Twitter: @NotDetectives

On this very special episode, Lauren and Christy take you through their journey from quarantine to The Kelly Clarkson Show and back to quarantine! Highlights include Christy's talk show debut, California Breaks, and reality TV that is so bad that it's good! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!

__

SHOW INFORMATION

Instagram: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Facebook: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Website: truecrimeandcocktails.com

Email: theories@truecrimeandcocktails.com

Twitter: @NotDetectives

Lauren and Christy share their experiences with scamming exes and discuss the Dateline series The Widower. Christy’s research reveals never before heard info on the third wife Leona, disturbing lyrics from an ‘80s song, and an eerily similar crime committed by a man with the exact same name! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!

__

SHOW INFORMATION

Instagram: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Facebook: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Website: truecrimeandcocktails.com

Email: theories@truecrimeandcocktails.com

Twitter: @NotDetectives

Lauren and Christy share their go-to wedding dance moves and discuss episodes 3 & 4 of the HBO documentary Murder on Middle Beach. Christy’s research reveals conflicting stories from witnesses about the day of the murder and a missing piece of evidence that could prove that the murder was pre-meditated! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!

__

SHOW INFORMATION

In the final episode of the season, Lauren and Christy share their New Years resolutions and discuss more fan theories. And then in true Lauren and Christy fashion, the duo goes off the rails on the subject of ‘80s TV shows. So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!

Lauren and Christy share Christy’s rocky history with maps and discuss the new Netflix Unsolved Mysteries episode “Tsunami Spirits”. Christy makes her science podcast dream a reality with her research on natural disasters and the duo reacts to ghost stories that were not featured on the original episode! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!

Pick up a True Crime & Cocktails T-shirt : https://www.bonfire.com/true-crime-and-cocktails/

Stuck at home this Halloween?! Don't worry, we've got you covered! In this special BONUS Halloween episode, Lauren and Christy share some spooky fan stories, and mix in a few twisted tales of their own. It's basically their own, personal episode of Unsolved Mysteries! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a HALLOWEEN slumber party!

__

Welcome to the very first episode of True Crime and Cocktails! Lauren and Christy uncover their childhood true crime origins and discuss the new Netflix Unsolved Mysteries episode "13 Minutes". Shocking witness reveals, questionable alibis, creepy husband background checks, and more! So grab a drink, put on some pjs, and join this duo for a true crime slumber party!

__

SHOW INFORMATION

Instagram: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Facebook: @TrueCrimeAndCocktails

Website: truecrimeandcocktails.com

Email: theories@truecrimeandcocktails.com

Twitter: @NotDetectives

Lauren currently stars in NBC's Superstore as well as She-Ra & the Princesses of Power. And Christy? Well, you don’t know her yet but trust us, after one episode, you're not gonna want to remember a time where you weren't listening to these two deep dive into all things true crime. They're basically the bffs you've always wanted.

It's also important to mention that season 1 of True Crime and Cocktails is an UNSOLVED MYSTERIES EDITION! Christy's impeccable research skills bring you new details about every episode of the new Netflix Unsolved Mysteries series.

Recorded at night, it's a true crime slumber party! So put on some pjs, pour yourself a drink and join Lauren and Christy as they break down true crime...and get a little buzz on while they do it.

__
